description:
The apartment is at the third floor of a renovated brownstone in the heart of Bed-Stuy, a fascinating neighborhood -- up-and-coming while but with a true sense of community.  

Two bedrooms with full-sized beds, closets and big windows that get direct morning sunshine. There's also a double-sized futon in the living room. 

There are plentiful coffee shops, fancy bars, nice restaurants. It's close to the C train at Kingston-Throop which brings you directly to Downtown Brooklyn and Manhattan.
name: COZY APARTMENT FULL OF LIGHT IN BED-STUY
review: The host canceled this reservation 9 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
